summary: This memo from March 29, 1967, details WI/I's activities related to the Council for Latin America, specifically addressing involvement with four organizations: Confederación Mexicana de Cámaras Industriales, Instituto de Investigaciones Sociales y Económicas, Centro Nacional de Estudios Sociales, and American Chamber of Commerce of Mexico. It outlines funding, objectives, and personnel associated with these organizations, including agent activities and project statuses.
tags: Instituto de Investigaciones Sociales y Económicas
American Chamber of Commerce of Mexico
title: Response to Memo on "Council for Latin America"
